name: PITAMBARA JAN KALYAN TRUST
briefDescription: PITAMBARA JAN KALYAN TRUST (PJKT) is legally incorporated on 30-05-2006 as a Trust under Trust Act 1882, and the registration no. IV-267/06. Through a continuous effort our organization has got the F.C.R.A. registration from Ministry of Home Affairs, Govt. of India on 30-12-2013 and having the registration No.337690016.The likeminded committed members of the association took a vow to eradicate poverty, eliminate backwardness and discrimination among the deprived section of the society living in the remote villages and forests in various districts of Jharkhand state. It primarily focuses on capacity building of youths and women. The organization is operating in rural and urban settings in the state of Jharkhand.Women, Youth and children are the focus point for intervention in the activities of Pitambara Jan Kalyan Trust. The organization advocates for sustainable human development, liberation from the drudgery of evils and exploitation especially for the poor and marginalized rural community. It stands for promoting socio-economic and language promotion. It believes that no development can be meaningful and sustainable until and unless there is equal participation in every sphere of life.
